answers.answer: I'm 31w2ds having a boy and I too feel very lazy! I'm badly anemic and I might have diabetes now which my Dr says is the cause of my tiredness and weakness. have you gotten blood tests and a gestational diabetes test yet?
Im 30 weeks with a baby girl and my energy is gone! Im so tired and lazy now
Also 30 weeks with my girl and I just wanna lay and rest all the time now :/
yes my test are all normal but still too tired...not even like to talk with anyone...

question: 31 weeks and feeling too lazy with a baby girl...
title: too lazy
